ing: 1 (2 pound) loaf processed cheese (such as VelveetaÂ®), cubed
1/2 cup hot pepper sauce (such as Frank's RedHotÂ®)
des: "I make this every year for my Big Game parties and everyone raves over it. You can make it as spicy or as mild as you want."
ins: Melt processed cheese in a slow cooker on Low. Cook and stir pork sausage in a large skillet over medium heat until browned and crumbly, about 10 minutes; drain excess grease. Mix sausage into processed cheese in the cooker, stir in salsa, hot sauce, and jalapeno peppers. Cook for 2 hours; serve hot.
